oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mobile Chest X-Ray Unit in Public Housing Development, c.1960
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Davidson County Health Department's Mobile Chest X-Ray Unit parked in a public housing development. Exact location unknown. Photographed by Buford Lewis Co., c.1960. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
